Select Type Libraries Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

From the Object library pull-down menu of the Class Browser window, select ActiveX»Select Type Libraries to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to choose an ActiveX type library in conjunction with the Class Browser window.

This dialog box includes the following component:

  • Type Libraries—Lists all the available type libraries. Click the Browse button above this list to navigate to and select the ActiveX type library you want to use.
